page.title: 12A day at first school(age 8)
page.content: At 10 to nine I come to school. At nine o'clock we start doing our first subject and that's Maths. We usually have a television programme in the morning, which probably leads to morning service. If it's sunny we go out to play but if it's wet Mrs Battye, our teacher, lets us stay in. After playtime we will do English work, after that it will be dinner time. The people on first sitting have Mrs Brown and Mrs Senior look after them but Mrs Gummerson looks after the other children. When the first sitting have come back it's our turn. After we've had our dinner we have another play time that lasts about five minutes. Then we probably will do art and craft then it will be time to have another play time. After that Mrs Battye would tell us a nice story.
